mapper.select: SELECT CM0101.DLR_CD,CM0101.DLR_NM , CM0101.SDPT_CD,(SELECT DIVI_NM FROM CM_2501T WHERE DIVI_CD = CM0101.SDPT_CD) AS SDPT_NM , CM0101.DIST_OFFICE_CD,(SELECT OFF_NM FROM CM_2601T WHERE OFF_CD = CM0101.DIST_OFFICE_CD AND DIVI_CD = CM0101.SDPT_CD) AS DIST_OFFICE_NM , CM0101.SALE_DLR_SUNG_CD,(SELECT CSTL_NM FROM CM_2701T WHERE CSTL_CD = CM0101.SALE_DLR_SUNG_CD) AS SALE_DLR_SUNG_NM , CM0101.SALE_DLR_CITY_CD,(SELECT CITY_NM FROM CM_3201T WHERE CSTL_CD = CM0101.SALE_DLR_SUNG_CD AND CITY_CD = CM0101.SALE_DLR_CITY_CD ) AS SALE_DLR_CITY_NM FROM CM_0101T CM0101 WHERE 1=1 AND CM0101.DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS VALUE FROM (SELECT DISTINCT (CM0101.SDPT_CD) AS SDPT_CD, (SELECT DIVI_NM FROM CM_2501T WHERE DIVI_CD = CM0101.SDPT_CD) AS SDPT_NM FROM CM_0101T CM0101 WHERE 1 = 1 AND CM0101.SDPT_CD IS NOT NULL AND SDPT_CD <> 'S99' ORDER BY SDPT_CD ASC)

SELECT DISTINCT (CM0101.SDPT_CD) AS SDPT_CD, (SELECT DIVI_NM FROM CM_2501T WHERE DIVI_CD = CM0101.SDPT_CD) AS SDPT_NM FROM CM_0101T CM0101 WHERE 1 = 1 AND CM0101.SDPT_CD IS NOT NULL AND SDPT_CD <> 'S99' ORDER BY SDPT_CD ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS VALUE FROM (SELECT DIST_OFFICE_CD, DIST_OFFICE_NM FROM (SELECT DISTINCT (CM0101.DIST_OFFICE_CD) AS DIST_OFFICE_CD, (SELECT OFF_NM FROM CM_2601T WHERE OFF_CD = CM0101.DIST_OFFICE_CD AND DIVI_CD = CM0101.SDPT_CD) AS DIST_OFFICE_NM, CM0101.SDPT_CD FROM CM_0101T CM0101 WHERE 1 = 1 AND CM0101.DIST_OFFICE_CD IS NOT NULL AND CM0101.SDPT_CD = #{sSdptCd}) WHERE DIST_OFFICE_NM IS NOT NULL)

SELECT DIST_OFFICE_CD ,DIST_OFFICE_NM FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT(CM0101.DIST_OFFICE_CD) AS DIST_OFFICE_CD ,(SELECT OFF_NM FROM CM_2601T WHERE OFF_CD = CM0101.DIST_OFFICE_CD AND DIVI_CD = CM0101.SDPT_CD) AS DIST_OFFICE_NM ,CM0101.SDPT_CD FROM CM_0101T CM0101 WHERE 1=1 AND CM0101.DIST_OFFICE_CD IS NOT NULL AND CM0101.SDPT_CD = #{sSdptCd} ) WHERE DIST_OFFICE_NM IS NOT NULL ORDER BY DIST_OFFICE_CD ASC

SELECT DIST_OFFICE_CD, DIST_OFFICE_NM FROM (SELECT A.DIST_OFFICE_CD, '[ ' || (SELECT DIVI_NM FROM CM_2501T WHERE DIVI_CD = A.SDPT_CD) || ' ] ' || (SELECT OFF_NM FROM CM_2601T WHERE OFF_CD = A.DIST_OFFICE_CD AND DIVI_CD = A.SDPT_CD) AS DIST_OFFICE_NM FROM CM_0101T A, SA_0439T B WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.DLR_CD = B.MNG_DLR_CD AND A.DLR_CD != 'A07AA' AND B.USR_ID = #{sUsrId} AND A.DIST_OFFICE_CD != 'ZQ' GROUP BY A.DIST_OFFICE_CD, A.SDPT_CD) WHERE DIST_OFFICE_NM IS NOT NULL

SELECT DISTINCT(A.DIST_OFFICE_CD) AS DIST_OFFICE_CD ,'[ '||(SELECT DIVI_NM FROM CM_2501T WHERE DIVI_CD = A.SDPT_CD)||' ] '|| (SELECT OFF_NM FROM CM_2601T WHERE OFF_CD = A.DIST_OFFICE_CD AND DIVI_CD = A.SDPT_CD) AS DIST_OFFICE_NM ,A.SDPT_CD FROM CM_0101T A WHERE 1=1 AND A.DIST_OFFICE_CD IS NOT NULL ORDER BY A.SDPT_CD , A.DIST_OFFICE_CD

SELECT CASE WHEN AS_TMONTH_SOLD > TMONTH_SOLD_CNT THEN 'DN' WHEN AS_TMONTH_SOLD < TMONTH_SOLD_CNT THEN 'UP' ELSE 'EQ' END AS MONTH_STAT, TMONTH_SOLD_CNT, CASE WHEN AS_TYEAR_SOLD > TYEAR_SOLD_CNT THEN 'DN' WHEN AS_TYEAR_SOLD < TYEAR_SOLD_CNT THEN 'UP' ELSE 'EQ' END AS YEAR_STAT, TYEAR_SOLD_CNT, STOCK_RATE, STOCK_CNT FROM (SELECT NVL((SELECT COUNT(*) AS TMONTH_SOLD_CNT FROM SA_0121T A WHERE TO_CHAR(A.CUST_SALE_DT, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1), 'YYYYMM') AND A.CAR_STAT_CD = '70' AND A.ORD_DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd}), 0) AS AS_TMONTH_SOLD, NVL((SELECT COUNT(*) AS TMONTH_SOLD_CNT FROM SA_0121T A WHERE TO_CHAR(A.CUST_SALE_DT, 'YYYYMM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND A.CAR_STAT_CD = '70' AND A.ORD_DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd}), 0) AS TMONTH_SOLD_CNT, NVL((SELECT COUNT(*) AS TYEAR_SOLD_CNT FROM SA_0121T A WHERE TO_CHAR(A.CUST_SALE_DT, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12), 'YYYY') AND A.CAR_STAT_CD = '70' AND A.ORD_DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd}), 0) AS AS_TYEAR_SOLD, NVL((SELECT COUNT(*) AS TYEAR_SOLD_CNT FROM SA_0121T A WHERE TO_CHAR(A.CUST_SALE_DT, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND A.CAR_STAT_CD = '70' AND A.ORD_DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd}), 0) AS TYEAR_SOLD_CNT, NVL((SELECT ROUND((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SA_0121T A WHERE A.CAR_STAT_CD = '60' AND A.ORD_DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd}) / (DECODE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SA_0121T A WHERE TO_CHAR(A.CUST_SALE_DT, 'YYYYMM') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -3), 'YYYYMM') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND A.CAR_STAT_CD = '70' AND A.ORD_DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd}), 0, 1, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SA_0121T A WHERE TO_CHAR(A.CUST_SALE_DT, 'YYYYMM') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -3), 'YYYYMM') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND A.CAR_STAT_CD = '70' AND A.ORD_DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd})) / 3) ,2) FROM DUAL), 0) AS STOCK_RATE, NVL((SELECT COUNT(*) AS STOCK_CNT FROM SA_0121T A WHERE A.CAR_STAT_CD = '60' AND A.ORD_DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd}), 0) AS STOCK_CNT FROM DUAL)
